pageContext.geocode_address: 216 Greenfield Ave, San Anselmo, CA 94960, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Enter the Star Wars universe and train to become a Jedi Master yourself with the help of Play-Well Marin and United Studios of Self Defense. Students will explore and create the iconic scenes from the Star Wars universe with LEGOÂ® at Play-Well Marin and go through real life lessons of Jedi self-defense from United Studios. Paired with education, action, and fun, we feel this camp in unique in its message. This full day camp includes supervised lunch. Early Drop-in build time is available at Play-Well at 8:00 AM and after camp till 6:00 PM at the discounted rate of $5/hour for registered campers.
